channel.title: Screencast: Automating Email with Drafts (feat. David Sparks)
channel.description:
We were happy to work with [David Sparks](https://www.macsparky.com) on several new videos introducing a number of basic Drafts concepts and workflows. The first in the series (below) covers using Drafts to capture and send emails. Look for more in the coming weeks discussing journaling, and building lists!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uWwKguStmkw
